title: uru tuNai puriya
sahitya:
uru tuNai puriya vENum murugA enakkini nI


anupallavi

  marakkAdu undan tirunAmam Odum nAn pirakkAdirukkum perum pEru peravE


caraNam    puyal pOl vIsi peru nAsham viLaiyavE sheyum ap-pErAshai shuzhalil sikki sOrndu
mayakkam uTren madi izhakkAdu tayakkamaTra un dayavinai aLikkum
